snippet: After months of protests over his July re-election, President Pierre Nkurunziza said Burundians must surrender illegal firearms by Saturday.
abstract: Burundi Pres Pierre Nkurunziza demands all citizens must surrender illegal firearms by end of week or risk being 'dealt with as enemies of the nation’; order comes after months of violent protests over his July re-election.
lead_paragraph: After months of protests over his July re-election, President Pierre Nkurunziza said Burundians must surrender illegal firearms by Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Burundi: A Deadline to Disarm
